bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng dian 風癲 , wind peak-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tian men dong 天門冬 quotes Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 Recipe Entry feng dian fang 風癲方， recipe for wind peak-illness, as: 風顛發作：則吐，耳如蟬鳴，引脅牽痛。天門冬去心皮，曝搗為末。 酒服方寸匕，日三服 , “When wind peak[-illness ] breaks out, [patients] spit and their ears experience sounds like those of cicadas. Pain affects the flanks. [For treatment use] tian men dong , with heart and skin removed. Dry under the sun and pound to a powder. Ingest 1 square-inch spoon with wine three times a day”.
